name: Turning Point Brands, Inc.
description: Turning Point Brands, Inc. is a leading provider of innovative products in the smokeless tobacco, vapor, and alternative products segments. Established in 2000 and headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, the company focuses on developing, marketing, and distributing a diverse range of products that meet the evolving preferences of adult consumers. TPB's portfolio includes well-known brands such as Zig-Zag, a leader in rolling papers, and Stoker's, a popular brand of moist snuff. The company has strategically positioned itself in the rapidly growing vapor market with products that cater to both traditional tobacco users and non-tobacco consumers seeking alternative options. Turning Point Brands places a strong emphasis on regulatory compliance and responsible marketing practices, ensuring that its products are marketed to adult consumers only. As a forward-thinking company, TPB continues to explore new product innovations and categories to adapt to changing consumer behaviors and market trends. The company is committed to enhancing shareholder value through strategic acquisitions, organic growth, and a focus on product quality and brand loyalty.
